Create commit_down

Source: vignettes/aa-create-commit_down.Rmd
aa-create-commit_down.Rmd
library(gitdown)
library(git2r)
library(dplyr)

Read list of commits

Reproducible example

Create a versioned directory with some commits and a NEWS.md

  • Some commits mention an issue with #
  • Some commits mention a ticket with ticket
  • A commit is associated with a tag
repo <- fake_repo()

Get commits and find pattern

  • Find all commits of a branch and associate with tags recursively
get_commits_tags(repo, ref = "master")
#> 4 commits found.
#> # A tibble: 4 x 9
#>   sha      summary  message      author email when                order tag.name
#>   <chr>    <chr>    <chr>        <chr>  <chr> <dttm>              <int> <chr>   
#> 1 be689c2… Add NEWS "Add NEWS\n… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:12     4 <NA>    
#> 2 20e5d17… Third c… "Third comm… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:11     3 v0.1    
#> 3 0efbd94… example… "example: m… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:11     2 v0.1    
#> 4 bb5c78e… First c… "First comm… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:10     1 v0.1    
#> # … with 1 more variable: tag.message <chr>
  • Find all commits of a branch and detect a specific pattern
    • Here we find commits mentioning an issue with #123 
get_commits_pattern(repo, pattern = "#[[:digit:]]+", ref = "master")
#> 4 commits found.
#> # A tibble: 7 x 12
#>   sha      summary  message      author email when                order tag.name
#>   <chr>    <chr>    <chr>        <chr>  <chr> <dttm>              <int> <chr>   
#> 1 be689c2… Add NEWS "Add NEWS\n… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:12     4 <NA>    
#> 2 be689c2… Add NEWS "Add NEWS\n… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:12     4 <NA>    
#> 3 be689c2… Add NEWS "Add NEWS\n… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:12     4 <NA>    
#> 4 20e5d17… Third c… "Third comm… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:11     3 v0.1    
#> 5 20e5d17… Third c… "Third comm… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:11     3 v0.1    
#> 6 0efbd94… example… "example: m… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:11     2 v0.1    
#> 7 bb5c78e… First c… "First comm… Alice  alic… 2021-04-10 10:39:10     1 v0.1    
#> # … with 4 more variables: tag.message <chr>, pattern.type <chr>,
#> #   pattern.content <chr>, pattern.title <chr>
